name: Ze Queen's Special Delivery - GMTK 2021
description:
You are an ant trying to control a meatball tumbling down the hill. Use the left and right arrows to control it . The more ants you gather, the faster the meatball goes, but ants will consume the meat! Be careful! Thorns will damage the ball and make you loose your precious meat.. Reach the Queen with a maximum of meat to please her!

Game takes quite a bit of time to launch. Hope you'll have fun playing it !
